subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: At the Players Championship on Sunday, Sergio García shot a final-round 71 to win the first sudden-death playoff in 21 years at the T.P.C. Sawgrass.
snippet: At the Players Championship on Sunday, Sergio García shot a final-round 71 to win the first sudden-death playoff in 21 years at the T.P.C. Sawgrass.
